languages.text: Под властью Вольного Торговца Фолстоун рос и привлекал все больше верующих. Но не все из них были благими душами — проповедники дегенеративных толкований Кредо, лжепророки и безумцы также стремились туда, надеясь обрести паству на святом мире. Борьба с опасными ересями вроде неомальпийства приводила к регулярным кровавым чисткам, давшим Фолстоуна мрачную славу.

Foulstone grew and continued to draw believers to it under the enlightened rule of the Rogue Trader. Alas, not every soul among them was pure: preachers of degenerate interpretations of the Imperial Creed, false prophets, and madmen also came, hoping to find a flock on the holy world. Fighting dangerous heresies like the Neomalpian sect led to regular bloody purges that earned Foulstone a grim reputation.
languages.original_text: Под властью Вольного Торговца Фолстоун рос и привлекал все больше верующих. Но не все из них были благими душами — проповедники дегенеративных толкований Кредо, лжепророки и безумцы также стремились туда, надеясь обрести паству на святом мире. Борьба с опасными ересями вроде неомальпийства приводила к регулярным кровавым чисткам, давшим Фолстоуна мрачную славу.

traits.locale_text: Foulstone grew and kept attracting believers under the enlightened rule of the Rogue Trader. Alas, not every soul among them was pure, the preachers of degenerate interpretations of the Imperial Creed, false prophets and madmen also arrived, hoping to find a flock on the holy world. Fighting dangerous heresies like the Neomalpian sect led to regular bloody purges that gave Foulstone a grim reputation.

Foulstone grew and kept attracting believers under the enlightened rule of the Rogue Trader. Fighting dangerous heresies like the Neomalpian sect led to regular bloody purges that gave Foulstone a grim reputation.

Alas, not every soul among them was pure: preachers of degenerate interpretations of the Imperial Creed, false prophets, and madmen also came, hoping to find a flock on the holy world. Fighting dangerous heresies like the Neomalpian sect led to regular bloody purges that earned Foulstone a grim reputation.

Alas, not every soul among them was pure: preachers of degenerate interpretations of the Imperial Creed, false prophets, and madmen also came, hoping to find a flock on the holy world. Fighting dangerous heresies like the Neomalpian sect led to regular bloody purges that earned Foulstone a grim reputation.

Foulstone grew and continued to draw believers to it under the enlightened rule of the Rogue Trader. Alas, not every soul among them was pure: preachers of degenerate interpretations of the Imperial Creed, false prophets, and madmen also came, hoping to find a flock on the holy world. Fighting dangerous heresies like the Neomalpian sect led to regular bloody purges that earned Foulstone a grim reputation.

languages.text: 在行商浪人的开明统治之下，荒寂岩地不断壮大，吸引了无数新的居民。遗憾的是，并非所有人都是虔诚之人。新的居民之中还包括假先知、疯子，以及对帝国信仰进行扭曲的堕落布道士，他们打算在这个神圣的世界中找到邪恶的同党。荒寂岩地的虔诚之人不断抗击着危险的异端分子，血腥的大清洗时有发生，荒寂岩地也因此广受敬畏。
languages.original_text: Foulstone grew and continued to draw believers to it under the enlightened rule of the Rogue Trader. Alas, not every soul among them was pure: preachers of degenerate interpretations of the Imperial Creed, false prophets, and madmen also came, hoping to find a flock on the holy world. Fighting dangerous heresies like the Neomalpian sect led to regular bloody purges that earned Foulstone a grim reputation.

traits.locale_text: 在行商浪人的开明统治之下，荒寂岩地不断壮大，吸引了无数新的居民。遗憾的是，并非所有人都是虔诚之人。新的居民之中还包括假先知、疯子，以及对帝国信仰进行扭曲的堕落布道士，他们打算在这个神圣的世界中找到邪恶的同党。荒寂岩地的虔诚之人不断抗击着危险的异端分子，血腥的大清洗时有发生，荒寂岩地也因此广受敬畏。

languages.text: 自由開拓者の啓蒙的な統治の下、ファウルストーンは発展し、信者を引き寄せ続けた。残念なことに、すべての魂が純粋というわけではなかった。帝国信条集の退廃的な解釈を説くプリーチャー、偽預言者、はたまた狂人も聖なる惑星で仲間を見つけようと願い、ここを訪れた。ネオマルピア一派のような危険な異端者との戦いの中で血生臭い粛清が定期的に起こり、ファウルストーンの評判は地に落ちた。
languages.original_text: Foulstone grew and continued to draw believers to it under the enlightened rule of the Rogue Trader. Alas, not every soul among them was pure: preachers of degenerate interpretations of the Imperial Creed, false prophets, and madmen also came, hoping to find a flock on the holy world. Fighting dangerous heresies like the Neomalpian sect led to regular bloody purges that earned Foulstone a grim reputation.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の啓蒙的な統治の下、ファウルストーンは発展し、信者を引き寄せ続けた。残念なことに、すべての魂が純粋というわけではなかった。帝国信条集の退廃的な解釈を説くプリーチャー、偽預言者、はたまた狂人も聖なる惑星で仲間を見つけようと願い、ここを訪れた。ネオマルピア一派のような危険な異端者との戦いの中で血生臭い粛清が定期的に起こり、ファウルストーンの評判は地に落ちた。

languages.text: Rochepeste se développa et continua d'attirer des croyants sous le règne éclairé {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Hélas, il n'y avait pas que des âmes pures parmi eux : des prêcheurs interprétant de façon dévoyée le Credo Impérial, de faux prophètes et des fous firent aussi le voyage, en espérant trouver un troupeau sur le saint monde. La lutte contre les hérésies dangereuses, comme la secte néomalpienne, entraîna des purges sanglantes régulières, qui valurent à Rochepeste une triste réputation.
languages.original_text: Foulstone grew and continued to draw believers to it under the enlightened rule of the Rogue Trader. Alas, not every soul among them was pure: preachers of degenerate interpretations of the Imperial Creed, false prophets, and madmen also came, hoping to find a flock on the holy world. Fighting dangerous heresies like the Neomalpian sect led to regular bloody purges that earned Foulstone a grim reputation.

traits.locale_text: Rochepeste se développa et continua d'attirer des croyants sous le règne éclairé {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Hélas, il n'y avait pas que des âmes pures parmi eux : des prêcheurs interprétant de façon dévoyée le Crédo Impérial, de faux prophètes et des fous firent aussi le voyage, en espérant trouver un troupeau sur le saint monde. La lutte contre les hérésies dangereuses, comme la secte néomalpienne, entraîna des purges sanglantes régulières, qui valurent à Rochepeste une triste réputation.

languages.text: Rocainmunda creció y siguió atrayendo a los creyentes bajo el sabio gobierno de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Por desgracia, no todos ellos eran puros: también llegaron predicadores de interpretaciones degeneradas del Credo imperial, falsos profetas y locos, con la esperanza de reunir un rebaño en el mundo sagrado. La lucha contra herejías peligrosas como la secta neomalpiana causó purgas sangrientas y regulares, lo que otorgó a Rocainmunda una fama oscura.
languages.original_text: Foulstone grew and continued to draw believers to it under the enlightened rule of the Rogue Trader. Alas, not every soul among them was pure: preachers of degenerate interpretations of the Imperial Creed, false prophets, and madmen also came, hoping to find a flock on the holy world. Fighting dangerous heresies like the Neomalpian sect led to regular bloody purges that earned Foulstone a grim reputation.

traits.locale_text: Rocainmunda creció y siguió atrayendo a los creyentes bajo el sabio gobierno de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Por desgracia, no todos ellos eran puros: también llegaron predicadores de interpretaciones degeneradas del Credo imperial, falsos profetas y locos, con la esperanza de reunir un rebaño en el mundo sagrado. La lucha contra herejías peligrosas como la secta neomalpiana causó purgas sangrientas y regulares, lo que otorgó a Rocainmunda una fama oscura.

languages.text: Foulstone wuchs und zog unter der erleuchteten Führung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} weiterhin Gläubige an. Leider war nicht jede Seele unter ihnen rein: Auch Prediger von degenerierten Interpretationen des Imperialen Glaubens, falsche Propheten und Wahnsinnige kamen in der Hoffnung, auf der heiligen Welt eine Herde zu finden. Kämpfe gegen gefährliche Ketzer wie die Neomalpian-Sekte führte regelmäßig zu blutigen Reinigungsaktionen, die Foulstone einen düsteren Ruf bescherten.
languages.original_text: Foulstone grew and continued to draw believers to it under the enlightened rule of the Rogue Trader. Alas, not every soul among them was pure: preachers of degenerate interpretations of the Imperial Creed, false prophets, and madmen also came, hoping to find a flock on the holy world. Fighting dangerous heresies like the Neomalpian sect led to regular bloody purges that earned Foulstone a grim reputation.

traits.locale_text: Foulstone wuchs und zog unter der erleuchteten Führung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} weiterhin Gläubige an. Leider war nicht jede Seele unter ihnen rein: Auch Prediger von degenerierten Interpretationen des Imperialen Glaubens, falsche Propheten und Wahnsinnige kamen in der Hoffnung, auf der heiligen Welt eine Herde zu finden. Kämpfe gegen gefährliche Ketzer wie die Neomalpian-Sekte führte regelmäßig zu blutigen Reinigungsaktionen, die Foulstone einen düsteren Ruf bescherten.

languages.text: Menfurtaş, büyümeyi ve Hür Tacir'in aydın hükümdarlığı altında inananları kendine çekmeyi sürdürdü. Ne yazık ki içinde barındırdığı her ruh saf değildi: İmparatorluk İtikadı'nı dejenere bir şekilde yorumlayan vaizler, sahte peygamberler ve deliler de kendilerine bir topluluk bulabilmek üzere bu kutsal gezegene doluştu. Neomalfiya gibi tehlikeli kâfirliklere karşı verilen mücadele, düzenli olarak kanlı arındırmalara yol açtı ve Binliman'a uğursuz bir nam kazandırdı.
languages.original_text: Foulstone grew and continued to draw believers to it under the enlightened rule of the Rogue Trader. Alas, not every soul among them was pure: preachers of degenerate interpretations of the Imperial Creed, false prophets, and madmen also came, hoping to find a flock on the holy world. Fighting dangerous heresies like the Neomalpian sect led to regular bloody purges that earned Foulstone a grim reputation.

traits.locale_text: Menfurtaş büyümeyi ve Hür Tacir'in aydın hükümdarlığı altında inananları kendine çekmeyi sürdürdü. Ne yazık ki içerisinde barındırdığı her ruh saf değildi: İmparatorluk İtikadı'nı dejenere bir şekilde yorumlayan vaizler, sahte peygamberler ve deliler de kendilerine bir topluluk bulabilmek üzere bu kutsal gezegene doluştu. Neomalfiya gibi tehlikeli kâfirliklere karşı verilen mücadele, düzenli olarak kanlı arındırmalara yol açtı ve Binliman'a uğursuz bir nam kazandırdı.
